You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
B2B COMMERCE AND D2C COMMERCE
Product Promotion Examples

To create different types of promotions for specific products, use these discount and qualifier settings.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Available in: B2B Commerce and D2C Commerce
CUSTOMER BUYS	CUSTOMER RECEIVES	DISCOUNT TARGET	DISCOUNT ADJUSTMENT TYPE	QUALIFIER	QUALIFIER RULE	EXAMPLE
Anything	Percent off Product A	Product A	Percentage Discount	—	—	Receive 10% off Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans.
Fixed amount off a line item of Product A	Product A	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	—	—	Receive $10 off your total purchase of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans.
Fixed amount off each unit of Product A	Product A	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	—	—	Receive $10 off each unit of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans.
Fixed price for Product A	Product A	Fixed Price	—	—	Receive a unit of Alpine Medium Roast Coffee Beans for $10.
Fixed price for a set of Product A	Product A	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	—	—	Receive 3 units of Alpine Medium Roast Coffee Beans for $20.
X worth of any product	Percent off Product A	Product A	Percentage Discount	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive 10% off Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans.
Fixed amount off a line item of Product A	Product A	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive $10 off Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans.
Fixed amount off each unit of Product A	Product A	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive $10 off each unit of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans.
Fixed price for Product A	Product A	Fixed Price	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive a unit of Alpine Medium Roast Coffee Beans for $10.
Fixed price for a set of Product A	Product A	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	—	Minimum Amount X	Spend $50 to receive 3 units of Alpine Medium Roast Coffee Beans for $20.
X units of Product A	Percent off Product A	Product A	Percentage Discount	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive 10% off that product.
Fixed amount off a line item of Product A	Product A	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive $10 off a line item of that product.
Fixed amount off each unit of Product A	Product A	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive $10 off each unit of that product.
Fixed price for Product A	Product A	Fixed Price	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive a unit of Alpine Medium Roast Coffee Beans for $10.
Fixed price for a set of Product A	Product A	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	Product A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 units of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive 3 units of Alpine Medium Roast Coffee Beans for $20.
X worth of Product A	Percent off Product A	Product A	Percentage Discount	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive 10% off products from the coffee machine category.
Fixed amount off a line item of Product A	Product A	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive 10% off that product.
Fixed amount off each unit of Product A	Product A	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive $10 off a line item of that product.
Fixed price for Product A	Product A	Fixed Price	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive a unit of that product for $10.
Fixed price for a set of Product A	Product A	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	Product A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of Alpine Medium Roast coffee beans to receive 3 units of that product for $20.
X products from Category A	Percent off Product B	Product B	Percentage Discount	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive 10% off an Alpine Professionals coffee machine.
Fixed amount off a line item of Product B	Product B	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive $10 off your purchase of Alpine Professionals coffee machines.
Fixed amount off each unit of Product B	Product B	Fixed Amount off Unit Price	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive $10 off each Alpine Professionals coffee machine.
Fixed price for Product B	Product B	Fixed Price	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive an Alpine Professionals coffee machine for $30.
Fixed price for a set of Product B	Product B	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	Category A	Minimum Quantity X	Buy 5 products from the Imports category to receive two Alpine Professionals coffee machines for $50.
X worth of products from Category A	Percent off Product B	Product B	Percentage Discount	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive 10% off an Alpine Professionals coffee machine.
Fixed amount off a line item of Product B	Product B	Fixed Amount off Line Item Total	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive $10 off your total purchase of Alpine Professionals coffee machines.
Fixed amount off each unit of Product B	Product B	Fixed Amount off Unit	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive $10 off each Alpine Professionals coffee machine.
Fixed price for Product B	Product B	Fixed Price	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive an Alpine Professionals coffee machine for $30.
Fixed price for a set of Product B	Product B	Total Fixed Price (Quantity limit required)	Category A	Minimum Amount X	Buy $50 worth of products from the Imports category to receive two Alpine Professionals coffee machines for $50.

title: Product Promotion Examples in Salesforce B2B Commerce
